articles.title: Omicron rewrites the COVID plan for 2022 - Reuters
articles.description: As the Omicron variant gains momentum in Europe and the United States, scientists are rewriting their expectations for the COVID-19 pandemic next year.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Soaring COVID-19 infections rattle Europe, fuel dread about holidays - 9News
articles.description: Soaring infections have rattled Europe, prompting new restrictions and fuelling a familiar dread about entering a new phase of the pandemic just in time for the holidays.
